data.value: Winlogon is displaying the "session contention" dialog box.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_10
data.value: The password has expired. Please update your password to continue logging on.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_12
data.value: The user name and authentication information are valid, but authentication was blocked due to restrictions on the user account, such as time-of-day restrictions.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_13
data.value: The attempted logon is not valid. This is due to either an incorrect user name or incorrect authentication information.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_14
data.value: The password has expired. The user must update their password to continue logging on.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_2
data.value: Winlogon is continuing with the logon process.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_4
data.value: Winlogon is displaying the "no permissions" dialog box.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_5
data.value: Winlogon is displaying the "disconnect refused" dialog box.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_6
data.value: Winlogon is displaying the "reconnect" dialog box.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_7
data.value: The user access has been denied.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_8
data.value: The logon failed because the logon credentials are not valid.

data.name: Connection.RDPConnection.OnLogonError_9
data.value: Another logon or post-logon error occurred. The remote desktop client displays a logon screen to the user.
